track.name: I Can't Stop Loving You
comments: So much better than the Nashville-damaged version I always hear.
Mr. Charles at his finest imho.
I'm all choked up inside. T.T
Shows you how good Metropolis is then.
Wow, I'm speechless. What a song!

I would have forgotten Metropolis if it weren't for this song.

Thank you, Ray.
Thought I'd stick this song on for a casual listen and god, all the memories of Metropolis came flooding back.  Need to dig that film out and become reacquainted with it, it was brilliant.
The perfect tune for those days when your girlfriend turns out to be a homicidal robot and the whole city like friggin' explodes.
First record i ever bought  just great
I did not hear this track on Metropolis, I just love the song.
